name: Dracula - Swords and Fangs
description:
This game was done for the 3 week Dracula jam Hosted by BasiliskOnline.

You are Dracula, a powerful vampire who is endlessly thirsty for BLOOD in a small village.

The more you kill, the more you get! As you collect BLOOD, you can trade some for powerful abilities and buffs.

But don't be hasty, the more you use, the more you lose! Each NIGHT, until the end of time you must keep drinking BLOOD to grow stronger as the more you stay, the more KNIGHTS challenge you with their piercing SWORDS!

Behold the mighty wrath of Dracula's BLOOD sucking FANGS, poor mortals!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Walk

O - Attack/Interact

Space - Dash

(You can also play on mobile by enabling the mobile controller in the main menu. Game controllers are also supported, but only tested with PS4 controllers. Please let us know if there are any issues with these alternative controls.)

LAGGY WHEN PLAYING ON BROWSER?

You can download the correct platform game below instead for a much smoother experience.
